name: Speech Sabotage Simulator
description:
⚠️ PLEASE NOTE: This game utilizes voice synthesis browser APIs, and is therefore intended to run on Google Chrome

The objective of Speech Sabotage Simulator is simple: you need to prevent Mr. President the 3rd from being re-elected. To do this, you need to modify his speech. The president has a terrible tendency to read word for word what's written in front of him, and will therefore read any edits you make verbatim.

This game is an entry to Trijam 188 the 3 hour game jam. Development of this game took ~2.5 hours.

Source code

The game is open source, and it's source code is hosted on GitHub:
https://github.com/saricden/trijam188
